plot: Three people who believe they are living their 'last day' set out to find peace with themselves before the day draws to a close.
title: Tri Diwrnod Diwetha'
plot_es: Three people who believe they are living their 'last day' set out to find peace with themselves before the day draws to a close.
plot_en: Three people who believe they are living their 'last day' set out to find peace with themselves before the day draws to a close.
